00020 #include "Global.h"

00024 #include <vector>

00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 class Vaccine_Dose;
00029 
00030 class Vaccine{
00031 public:
00032   // Creation
00033   Vaccine(string _name, int _id, int _disease, 
00034           int _total_avail, int _additional_per_day, 
00035           int _start_day, int num_strains, int *_strains);
00036   ~Vaccine();
00037   
00038   void add_dose(Vaccine_Dose* dose);
00039   
00040   int get_disease()                 const { return disease; }
00041   int get_ID()                     const { return id; }
00042   int get_number_doses()           const { return doses.size(); }
00043   Vaccine_Dose* get_dose(int i)    const { return doses[i]; }
00044   
00045   // Logistics Functions
00046   int get_initial_stock()          const { return initial_stock; }
00047   int get_total_avail()            const { return total_avail; }
00048   int get_current_reserve()        const { return reserve; }
00049   int get_current_stock()          const { return stock; }
00050   int get_additional_per_day()     const { return additional_per_day; }
00051   void add_stock( int add ){ 
00052     if(add <= reserve){
00053       stock   += add;
00054       reserve -= add;
00055     }
00056     else{
00057       stock   += reserve;
00058       reserve  = 0;
00059     }
00060   }
00061   
00062   void remove_stock( int remove ) {
00063     stock-=remove;
00064     if(stock < 0) stock = 0;
00065   }
00066 
00067   int get_num_strains() {
00068     return num_strains;
00069   }
00070   
00071   int get_strain(int i);
00072 
00073   //Utility Functions
00074   void print() const;
00075   void update(int day);
00076   void reset();
00077   
00078 private:
00079   string name;
00080   int id;                              // Which in the number of vaccines is it
00081   int disease;                          // Which Disease is this vaccine for
00082   int number_doses;                    // How many doses does the vaccine need.
00083   //int ages[2];                         // Applicable Ages
00084   vector < Vaccine_Dose* > doses;       // Data structure to hold the efficacy of each dose.
00085   
00086   int initial_stock;                   // How much available at the beginning
00087   int total_avail;                     // How much total in reserve
00088   int stock;                           // How much do you currently have
00089   int reserve;                         // How much is still left to system
00090   int additional_per_day;              // How much can be introduced into the system on a given day
00091   
00092   int start_day;                       // When to start production
00093 
00094   int *strains;
00095   int num_strains;
00096   
00097   // for statistics
00098   int number_delivered;
00099   int number_effective;
00100   
00101 protected:
00102   Vaccine() { }
00103 };
